content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at (15.5, 70.5)
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) facing DOWN (status: NO_POWER)
- Burner mining drill at (16.0, 71.0) facing DOWN (status: WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION)
- Output chest at (16.5, 72.5) (empty)
- Connected to small electric poles at (15.5, 68.5) and (13.5, 70.5)
- Currently not powered (warning: "not receiving electricity")

### Copper Ore Mining Operation at (-46.5, 70.5)
- Electric mining drill at (-46.5, 70.5) facing DOWN (status: NO_POWER)
- Burner mining drill at (-46.0, 71.0) facing DOWN (status: WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION)
- Output chest at (-46.5, 72.5) containing 33 copper ore
- Currently not powered (warning: "not receiving electricity")

### Power Plant Construction at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) facing RIGHT (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 1.5) facing RIGHT (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- Boiler at (-7.0, -0.5) facing RIGHT (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- Currently not operational (warnings: "no fluid present in connections")

### Iron Smelting Setup at (16.0, 74.0)
- Stone furnace at (16.0, 74.0) facing UP (status: NO_INGREDIENTS)
- Stone furnace at (18.0, 74.0) facing UP (status: NO_INGREDIENTS)
- Burner inserter at (16.5, 72.5) facing UP (status: WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION)
- Burner inserter at (16.5, 75.5) facing LEFT (status: WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS)
- Output chest at (17.5, 75.5) (empty)

### Disconnected Pipe Networks
- PipeGroup at (-21.5, -2.5) - status: EMPTY (extensive network)
- PipeGroup at (-4.5, 3.5) - status: EMPTY (extends to x=30.5,y=63.5)
- PipeGroup at (-4.5, 10.5) - status: EMPTY
- PipeGroup at (-8.5, 17.5) - status: EMPTY
- PipeGroup at (31.5, 39.5) - status: EMPTY

## ERROR TIPS

### Belt Connection Errors (Updated)
- Repeated attempts to connect belts directly from chests without inserters
  - Always place an inserter between chests and belts
  - Verify inserter orientation matches flow direction
  - Check for proper spacing between components

### Entity Placement Collisions (Updated)
- Multiple failed inserter placements due to occupied tiles
  - Clear target area completely before placing new entities
  - Check for hidden entities or terrain features
  - Verify exact placement coordinates are available

### Smelting Setup Issues (Updated)
- Furnaces showing "no ingredients to smelt" warnings
  - Verify inserter placement and fuel supply
  - Check ore supply chain from mining to smelting
  - Ensure proper chest connections for input/output

### Function Definition Errors (New)
- Attempted to call undefined function get_throughput()
  - Define all functions before calling them
  - Verify function names match exactly
  - Check for proper function scope

### General Tips (Updated)
- For power plant construction:
  - Complete fluid connections before placing steam engines
  - Verify all components are properly aligned
  - Check connection status indicators
- For mining operations:
  - Ensure output chests have space
  - Verify fuel supply for burner drills
  - Check power connections for electric drills
